title: Waters Delivers Opening Statement at Full Committee Hearing on the President’s Working Group Report on Stablecoins
summary: Congresswoman Maxine Waters (D-CA), Chairwoman of the House Committee on Financial Services, gave the following statement at a full Committee virtual hearing entitled, “Digital Assets and the Future of Finance: The President’s Working Group on Financial Markets’ Report on Stablecoins.” Today’s hearing is part of this Committee’s ongoing review of digital assets. title: Waters Statement on Marty Gruenberg Becoming Acting FDIC Chairman
summary: Today, Congresswoman Maxine Waters (D-CA), Chairwoman of the House Financial Services Committee, released the following statement after the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) announced that FDIC board member, Martin Gruenberg, has become Acting Chair pursuant to the succession plan provided in the agency’s bylaws. “I want to congratulate Marty Gruenberg for being elevated to Acting Chair...

title: America COMPETES Act Containing Key Provisions Authored by Committee Members Passes in House
